title: Fully updated triplex!
posting_body: One of the nicest triplexes in the city, this beautifully remodeled property is located in a well sought-after area of Cleveland Heights!
Close to Coventry, Little Italy, University Circle and Cleveland Clinic.
Each unit has been COMPLETELY updated floor-to-ceiling with kitchen cabinets/stainless-steel appliances, bath, plumbing, electrical, hot water tanks, paint, and flooring.
There are still 2 units remaining, each with 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, living room with fireplace, dining room, and new central heat/air conditioning.
The 2-car garage provides 1 parking spot for each unit.
The basement common area provides laundry facilities.
Secure storage room in basement is available for an extra monthly fee.
Renters pay for gas and electric.
